points.name: CN Tower
points.script: Welcome to CN Tower! This is where your journey begins.

points.name: Art Gallery of Ontario
points.script: Hey everyone, welcome to the AGO! I'm so glad you're here. This place is packed with incredible art, from Canadian masters like the Group of Seven to stunning international works. Did you know the AGO houses the largest collection of Canadian art? Be sure to check out the modern collections too! They’re very intriguing. Now, let’s head inside and dive in. I encourage you to take your time, let the art speak to you, and discover your own personal favorites. Happy exploring!

points.name: Royal Ontario Museum
points.script: Hey everyone, welcome to the ROM! I'm thrilled to show you around. Did you know we house over 13 million artifacts and artworks? We're talking dinosaurs, ancient Egypt, dazzling gems, and incredible Canadian art – a real feast for the eyes! Today, we'll focus on the highlights, but honestly, you could spend days here. Don't miss the iconic totem poles in our First Peoples gallery, they're simply breathtaking. Now, let's dive in and start exploring! Observe the artifacts!

points.name: Casa Loma
points.script: Welcome to Casa Loma, Toronto's majestic castle! Built by Sir Henry Pellatt, a true visionary, this place is bursting with history and secrets. Did you know it cost a cool $3.5 million back in 1914? Imagine the parties thrown in this grand ballroom! Take a moment to picture life in the early 20th century, then step inside and explore the secret tunnels, the stables, and the stunning views from the towers. There's so much to see! Let's go discover the magic of Casa Loma together.

points.name: CN Tower
points.script: Hey there! Welcome to the CN Tower, Toronto's iconic landmark! Did you know it was once the tallest freestanding structure in the world? Pretty impressive, right? Get ready for breathtaking views from up here! We'll whisk you up in a super-fast elevator – feel your ears pop! Take a stroll on the glass floor if you dare, and enjoy incredible 360-degree panoramas. From the bustling city below to the vast expanse of Lake Ontario, it's a sight you won't forget. Now, go on and explore the magnificent views!
